players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who was found dead during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any suspicious behavior."

You: "I'm shocked about Charlie. We need to be really careful here. With only four of us to start, losing Charlie puts us in a tough spot. Does anyone have any information that might help us figure out who did this?"

Diana: "I'm concerned about the safety of our group now that one of us has been eliminated. Let's all be truthful and open with each other to help build trust and ensure we can identify any potential threats."

Bob: "I agree with Diana that we need to be truthful and open with each other. I have no information to share at the moment, but I will do my best to observe any suspicious behavior from Alice or anyone else."
You: "Bob, why are you specifically calling out that you'll watch me for suspicious behavior? That seems like an odd thing to say unless you're trying to deflect attention from yourself."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)

players.name: Bob
